reasoning: HBOC (BRCA1/BRCA2 mutations) affects ~0.1-1% of population with incidence ~0.8 per 100k. Based on epidemiological studies of hereditary cancer syndromes.
source: Easton DF et al. (2005). Genome-wide association study identifies novel breast cancer susceptibility loci. Nat Genet. 39(7):865-869
